title: A Deeper Look at High On Life 2 – Coming to Game Pass This Winter!
description: The post A Deeper Look at High On Life 2 – Coming to Game Pass This Winter! appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Joe Skrebels, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief
excerpt: High On Life 2 is a sequel of epic proportions. Score a deeper look at the game’s newest weapons, locations, and more.
text: SummaryThe latest title from Squanch Games, High On Life 2, will be released this winter!High On Life 2 will be available for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud Gaming, Xbox Play Anywhere, and day one with Game Pass.Peek into the all-new world of High On Life 2 with a deeper look into the game’s debut trailer. Return to the hilariously action-packed world of High On Life in the upcoming intergalactic adventure from Squanch Games: High On Life 2. High On Life 2 introduces an all-new intergalactic conspiracy that threatens the fate of humanity. Set for a release this winter, prepare for an epic mission across a variety of exotic locales alongside a refreshed and fully-loaded arsenal of talking alien guns. Following the debut of High On Life 2’s first official trailer at the Xbox Games Showcase, players will be elated to see the return of several familiar weapons from their original High On Life arms cache. Not only do Sweezy, Creature, and Gus earn their formal homecoming, but notably making a sharp return is Knifey, gaming’s ultimate bloodthirsty melee at the epicenter of 2023’s High On Knife DLC expansion.  While the original gang of guns will certainly assist the cause as users blast their way through high-octane hyperactive combat, High On Life 2 adds several new dynamic shooters into the mix. The latest assortment of weapons creates a well rounded medley of lethal proportions that promises both striking action and Squanch Games’ signature comedic flair. During High On Life’s initial premiere in 2022, Squanch Games unlocked a variety of esteemed achievements – the FPS was quickly affirmed as Xbox’s biggest 3rd party launch in Game Pass historyand managed to become the biggest single-player Game Pass launch of the era. With a total player base of over 20 million and counting, the studio behind the galactic mayhem is eager to satiate the hunger of its audience with even more HOL. “The Squanch Games team is ecstatic to continue expanding the world of High On Life with a sequel release. We’ve been floored with the amount of support for the original game and couldn’t be more excited for our players to revisit this universe after nearly 3 years. High On Life 2 is undoubtedly the best, most ambitious project our studio has crafted to date – it’s bigger and better in every way,” says studio CEO, Mike Fridley. High On Life 2 is a total elevation of its original installment. Visuals are taken to their ultimate creative heights, combat is bolder than ever before, and fresh narrative breathes new life into each character. The game’s official trailer lays it all on the table, and you don’t want to miss a single frame. Chief Creative Officer of Squanch Games, Mikey Spano, visited Xbox Studios to explore the trailer taking the internet by storm. Scene by scene, score a closer look at the visionary threads that weave together your first peek at High On Life 2! Humanzapro. Combat. Skateboarding. Weaponry. Comedy. It all comes together in an innovative blend of action-packed adventure having players wreak havoc at the galaxy’s biggest convention, an alien zoo for humans, and a luxury futuristic cruiseliner on a cosmic quest to take down Big Pharma. Squanch Games already disrupted the traditional FPS genre with High On Life, and its impact left a unique space in gaming that the indie studio is ready to fill once again. Next steps? Console domination. High On Life 2 is prepared to redefine the gaming experience with an extraordinary escapade that immerses its players into a vivid, high-impact, and hysterical world. Your current objective: wishlist now! You’ve done it. You’ve taken down an intergalactic cartel, brought humanity back from the brink of extinction, and hunted dangerous bounties to the far corners of the galaxy. Bounty hunting has brought you fortune, fame and love; but when a mysterious figure from your past reappears and puts a price on your sister’s head, your cushy life gets thrown into chaos. Do you have what it takes to risk it all and bring down an intergalactic conspiracy that once again threatens your favorite species (humans)? High On Life RETURNS as you and your beloved rag-tag team of alien misfits shoot, stab, and skate your way through gorgeous, dangerous worlds all across the galaxy to blow up the EVIL pharmaceutical conglomerate hell-bent on putting price tags on HUMAN LIFE!
html:
Summary

  • The latest title from Squanch Games, High On Life 2, will be released this winter!
  • High On Life 2 will be available for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud Gaming, Xbox Play Anywhere, and day one with Game Pass.
  • Peek into the all-new world of High On Life 2 with a deeper look into the game’s debut trailer.

Return to the hilariously action-packed world of High On Life in the upcoming intergalactic adventure from Squanch Games: High On Life 2.

High On Life 2 introduces an all-new intergalactic conspiracy that threatens the fate of humanity. Set for a release this winter, prepare for an epic mission across a variety of exotic locales alongside a refreshed and fully-loaded arsenal of talking alien guns.

Following the debut of High On Life 2’s first official trailer at the Xbox Games Showcase, players will be elated to see the return of several familiar weapons from their original High On Life arms cache. Not only do Sweezy, Creature, and Gus earn their formal homecoming, but notably making a sharp return is Knifey, gaming’s ultimate bloodthirsty melee at the epicenter of 2023’s High On Knife DLC expansion. 

While the original gang of guns will certainly assist the cause as users blast their way through high-octane hyperactive combat, High On Life 2 adds several new dynamic shooters into the mix. The latest assortment of weapons creates a well rounded medley of lethal proportions that promises both striking action and Squanch Games’ signature comedic flair.

During High On Life’s initial premiere in 2022, Squanch Games unlocked a variety of esteemed achievements – the FPS was quickly affirmed as Xbox’s biggest 3rd party launch in Game Pass historyand managed to become the biggest single-player Game Pass launch of the era. With a total player base of over 20 million and counting, the studio behind the galactic mayhem is eager to satiate the hunger of its audience with even more HOL.

“The Squanch Games team is ecstatic to continue expanding the world of High On Life with a sequel release. We’ve been floored with the amount of support for the original game and couldn’t be more excited for our players to revisit this universe after nearly 3 years. High On Life 2 is undoubtedly the best, most ambitious project our studio has crafted to date – it’s bigger and better in every way,” says studio CEO, Mike Fridley.

High On Life 2 is a total elevation of its original installment. Visuals are taken to their ultimate creative heights, combat is bolder than ever before, and fresh narrative breathes new life into each character. The game’s official trailer lays it all on the table, and you don’t want to miss a single frame.

Chief Creative Officer of Squanch Games, Mikey Spano, visited Xbox Studios to explore the trailer taking the internet by storm. Scene by scene, score a closer look at the visionary threads that weave together your first peek at High On Life 2!

Humanzapro. Combat. Skateboarding. Weaponry. Comedy. It all comes together in an innovative blend of action-packed adventure having players wreak havoc at the galaxy’s biggest convention, an alien zoo for humans, and a luxury futuristic cruiseliner on a cosmic quest to take down Big Pharma.

Squanch Games already disrupted the traditional FPS genre with High On Life, and its impact left a unique space in gaming that the indie studio is ready to fill once again. Next steps? Console domination. High On Life 2 is prepared to redefine the gaming experience with an extraordinary escapade that immerses its players into a vivid, high-impact, and hysterical world.

Your current objective: wishlist now!

You’ve done it. You’ve taken down an intergalactic cartel, brought humanity back from the brink of extinction, and hunted dangerous bounties to the far corners of the galaxy. Bounty hunting has brought you fortune, fame and love; but when a mysterious figure from your past reappears and puts a price on your sister’s head, your cushy life gets thrown into chaos. Do you have what it takes to risk it all and bring down an intergalactic conspiracy that once again threatens your favorite species (humans)? High On Life RETURNS as you and your beloved rag-tag team of alien misfits shoot, stab, and skate your way through gorgeous, dangerous worlds all across the galaxy to blow up the EVIL pharmaceutical conglomerate hell-bent on putting price tags on HUMAN LIFE!
